hero.title: IFRC Report System
hero.description: Comprehensive document management and reporting platform for the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies. Access, analyze, and collaborate on humanitarian reports and publications.

document.title: Document Management
document.description: Organize and categorize reports with advanced filtering and search capabilities.

global.title: Global Access
global.description: Access humanitarian reports and publications from anywhere in the world.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Analyze trends and insights from comprehensive humanitarian data.
